trans-unit.source: Represents the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] color profile that is associated with a bitmap image.
trans-unit.target: Representa o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] ou [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] perfil que está associado uma imagem de mapa de bits de cores.

trans-unit.source: The supported standard color spaces are sRGB, ScRGB, RGB, CMYK, Gray, Multichannel, and unknown.
trans-unit.target: Os espaços de cor padrão suportados são sRGB, ScRGB, RGB, CMYK, cinzento, multicanal e desconhecido.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> with the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] color profile located at a given <xref:System.Uri>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"> </xref> com o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] ou [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] perfil localizado num determinado <xref:System.Uri>.</xref:System.Uri> de cores

trans-unit.source: To use any of the unsupported color profiles, you must install one and use its URI to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext> by using the ColorContext constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para utilizar qualquer um dos perfis de cor não suportado, tem de instalar um e utilizar o seu respetivo URI ao inicializar o <xref:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext>utilizando o construtor de ColorContext.</xref:System.Windows.Media.ColorContext>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Uri> that identifies the location of the desired color profile.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Uri>que identifica a localização do perfil de cor pretendido.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> with the standard color profile (sRGB or RGB ) that most closely matches the supplied <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"> </xref> com o perfil de cor standard (sRGB ou RGB) que melhor coincida com o fornecido <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat"></xref> from which the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> is derived.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Media.PixelFormat"> </xref> partir do qual o <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"> </xref> é derivado.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an <xref:System.Object> is equal to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Determina se um <xref:System.Object>é igual a uma instância de <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Object> to compare for equality.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Object>a comparação de igualdade.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the supplied <xref:System.Object> is equal to this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o fornecido <xref:System.Object>é igual a esta instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"> </xref>; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets the hash code for this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o código hash para esta instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Int32> that represents the hash code for the object.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Int32>que representa o código hash para o objeto.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: Operates on two instances of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> to determine equality.
trans-unit.target: Funciona com duas instâncias do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"> </xref> para determinar a igualdade.

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: A primeira instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"> </xref> para comparar.

trans-unit.source: The second instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: A segunda instância de <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"> </xref> para comparar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the instances of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as instâncias de <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"> </xref> são igual; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Operates on two instances of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> to determine that they are not equal.
trans-unit.target: Funciona com duas instâncias do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"> </xref> para determinar que não são iguais.

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: A primeira instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"> </xref> para comparar.

trans-unit.source: The second instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: A segunda instância de <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"> </xref> para comparar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the instances of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"></xref> are not equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as instâncias de <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorContext"> </xref> não são igual; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a readable <xref:System.IO.Stream> of raw color profile data.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um legível <xref:System.IO.Stream>dos dados de perfil de cor não processados.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: A readable <xref:System.IO.Stream> of raw color profile data.
trans-unit.target: Um legível <xref:System.IO.Stream>dos dados de perfil de cor não processados.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref:System.Uri> that represents the location of a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] color profile.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref:System.Uri>que representa a localização de um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] ou [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] cor perfil.</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Uri> that represents the location of a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] color profile.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Uri>que representa a localização de um [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icc](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-icc-md.md)] ou [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_icm](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] cor perfil.</xref:System.Uri>
